@@ -103,0 +103,2 @@
+	public static final String ClassLeakingRule_CONFIG_CALCULATION_TIMEOUT = "ClassLeakingRule_CONFIG_CALCULATION_TIMEOUT"; //$NON-NLS-1$
+	public static final String ClassLeakingRule_CONFIG_CALCULATION_TIMEOUT_LONG = "ClassLeakingRule_CONFIG_CALCULATION_TIMEOUT_LONG"; //$NON-NLS-1$

@@ -107,0 +107,2 @@
+ClassLeakingRule_CONFIG_CALCULATION_TIMEOUT=Calculation Timeout (in minutes)
+ClassLeakingRule_CONFIG_CALCULATION_TIMEOUT_LONG=Maximum amount of time to calculate Class Leak Rule (in minutes).

@@ -2776,3 +2776,3 @@
-            <severity>OK</severity>
-            <summary>com.oracle.medrec.model.User was loaded -1 time(s) without being unloaded</summary>
-            <explanation>Some classes have been loaded multiple times, and the difference between the number of times a class have been loaded and the number of times it has been unloaded has exceeded the user specified limit. This in itself need not be a problem, but check to see if you expect these classes to be loaded multiple times to make sure that you do not have a class loader leak. The following classes were detected as potential problems: <ul><li>com.oracle.medrec.model.User (-1)</li><li>com.oracle.medrec.service.PatientService (-1)</li><li>com.oracle.medrec.service.PhysicianService (-1)</li><li>com.oracle.medrec.facade.PatientFacade (-1)</li><li>com.oracle.medrec.common.messaging.MessageClient (-1)</li></ul></explanation>
+            <severity>Information</severity>
+            <summary>java.lang.Object was loaded 258 time(s) without being unloaded</summary>
+            <explanation>Some classes have been loaded multiple times, and the difference between the number of times a class have been loaded and the number of times it has been unloaded has exceeded the user specified limit. This in itself need not be a problem, but check to see if you expect these classes to be loaded multiple times to make sure that you do not have a class loader leak. The following classes were detected as potential problems: <ul><li>java.lang.Object (258)</li><li>java.lang.String (95)</li><li>java.lang.Class (81)</li><li>java.lang.Integer (52)</li><li>oracle.jrockit.jfr.VMJFR (46)</li></ul></explanation>
